description: These mushroom and black bean burgers are tasty and can make a delicious dinner.
keywords: Vegie burger,Seafood free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Peanut free
name: Chestnut Mushroom & Black Bean Burgers Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 200°C/180°C fan-forced. Prepare a foil lined baking tray.
In a food processor, blitz the onion, mushrooms, bread, thyme, garlic powder, black pepper and tamari to a fine crumb.
Add the drained black beans to the food processor and pulse to form a smooth mixture.
Divide the mixture into 4 thick burger patties, place them on the baking tray and brush with olive oil on each side. Bake for 20 minutes, then add the cheese and bake for 5 more minutes.
Remove from the oven and place in gluten free rolls to serve, along with toppings of your choice.
